questions: Is there an image of a character whose aura is being graded? Answer with yes or no.
Is the image cropped to the size of a real card? Answer with yes or no.
Does the label at the top have the title 'GNRLYXYZ'? Answer with yes or no.
Is '1/1' displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ' on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a barcode placed beneath the '1/1'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the grade label displayed on the right side of the label at the top? Answer with yes or no.
Is the numeric grade from the scale displayed below the grade label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the certification number displayed below the numeric grade? Answer with yes or no.
Is all text on the label uniform in size? Answer with yes or no.
Is there balanced padding from the border for all text on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the display placed on a white background? Answer with yes or no.
Is the full display shown without any text or labels on the card? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
no The image does not appear to show a grading process of a character's aura.
no The image is not formatted like a card and does not seem cropped to resemble one.
no There is no label present at the top of the image with the title 'GNRLYXYZ'.
no Since there is no such label, '1/1' is not displayed below any such title.
no With no '1/1' text, there can't be a barcode beneath it.
no There is no label at the top of the image for a grade label to be on the right.
no Without a grade label or numeric grade, this cannot exist in the image.
no As there is no numeric grade, a certification number would also not be present.
no All text mentioned elements do not appear on the label hence not uniform in size.
no Given there is no text or specific labeled area, balanced padding is not observed.
no The background is not entirely white; it appears as a library setting.
no Texts or labels as detailed in previous queries are not present but it's not full display.
